survey_name: Gen Z Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Gen Z employees with digital collaboration tools in their workplaces.

questions.question_text: How often do you use digital collaboration tools for work-related tasks?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale for accurate responses. Ensure options cover the full range of possible usage.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you use digital collaboration tools for work-related tasks?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital collaboration tools do you use at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture the variety of tools used. Include an 'Other' option for tools not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox for multi-choice selection. Include a text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital collaboration tools do you use at work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What do you value most in a digital collaboration tool?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2.
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify key priorities for Gen Z employees when selecting collaboration tools.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button for single-choice selection. Include a text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What do you value most in a digital collaboration tool?

script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who selected at least one tool in Q2.
